entry.event: two research paper about federated learning is published. One in JAuto, accelerating the training and improving the performance in trajectory prediction. Another in Euro-par 2024, addressing the long-tail issue in federated classification.
we present our research paper on intelligent vehicle symposium 2024, bringing forward a safe reinforcement learning policy for cutting-in scenarios in ACC.
a paper is accepted by 57th CISS, predicting location of cellphone by BLE signal for a keyless entry in vehicle.
a paper is accepted by IJCNN, adversarial learning a deep network for intrusion detection.
away passed our lovely pet cat in outbreak of COVID-19 in Shanghai.
A dual batch size training method is published in 33rd ICTAI.
start my another role in UAES XE BU as senior manager
away passed my grandma
Our model presented in ISBI2020 is further summarized in a theranostics journal paper.
a paper about predicting MSI status from pathlogic image is accepted by ISBI2020
a paper about a new network pruning method is accepted by ICMLC2020
a paper about a new boundary constraint loss for semantic segmentation is accepted by JMIHI
join UAES as chief AI scientist
join Tencent AI Lab
leave GE Digital
on Sept.7th, finally born were my lovely son!
a paper about annotation arrhythmia for ECG cloud by deep network is accept by CIT2018.
start working in GE Digital as staff data scientist.
a paper about microcalcification twinkling in B-Flow U/S mode is accept by JOMU.
a paper about ultrasonic pulse compression in downhole drilling is accept by CIT2015.
get the Data Science Specialization Certification from Johns Hopkins University. This specialization includes 9 courses and a capstone project, which takes me about a whole year.
get married
purchase a Ford Focus ST 1.6MT
create a app in google app engine to generate the RSS feed of Sina Weibo
finish GB project and is certified as a GB of 6Sigma
get my driver license
pass all exams of the GB of 6Sigma
add RSS feed to my home site
join GE Global Research as a lead engineer
leave Philips Research Asia
moved into my new apartment.
away passed my maternal grandpa
get my second Ph.D. degree in computer science from school of computer science and engineering, Aizu University, Japan.
a publication about the cardiac computational model and electrophysiological study conducted on this model is accept by Adv Eng Soft.. The source files used in this paper is in cardiacsimu project.
cardiacsimu v0.03 is released as well as the configuration files for simulation reentry.
cardiacsimu v0.02 is released with some configuration files for simulation.
start working in Philips Research Asia as a scientist in healthcare department.
cardiacsimu v0.01 is released.
become a member of WOSH project.
a publication about interpolation of epicardial mapping data on 3D atrium model is accepted by Comput Biol Med.. The source files used in this paper is in cardiac map suite project.
cardiacmap v2.00 is released. Within this version, the new interpolation method is released.
cardiacmap v1.00 is released. This version is used in animal experiments for several times.
get my first Ph.D. degree in biomedical enginnering from department of E.E., school of information science and technology, Fudan University, China.
away passed my maternal grandma.
enroll into the Ph.D. program in Aizu University, this is a dual diploma program with Fudan University.
fulfill the master program earlier and change into the Ph.D. program.
start a very serious relationship.
enroll into the master program in Fudan University.
start my career in Baokang Control Engineering Ltd., Shanghai, China.
graduate from Nanjing University of Science and Technology.

links.name: Nanjing University of Science and Technology
